location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Map showing petroliferous areas visited by Admiralty Oil Commission 1913’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions: 297 mm x 240 mm.Foliation:The map is foliated in the top right corner with a circled pencil number.Materials: 1 paper folio.

mods.abstract: Black-and-white printed map, which is part of a larger document entitled Navy (Fuel Oil).Agreement with the Anglo-Persian Oil Company, Limited, published by HM’s Stationery Office, 1914 (ff 301-319). The map indicates the areas visited and oil shows not examined by an Admiralty Oil Commission, which toured the region around the Persian Gulf in 1913. Areas visited are indicated by a double underline under the place name. Oil shows not examined are indicated by a single underline under the place name. The coastline of the Gulf, and river systems feeding into the Gulf, are the only geographic features detailed.
